languages.text: "Когда многорукое чудовище смотрело на меня, я видела... нечто. Огромную черную тень за пределами его взгляда. В ней не было цветов... вовсе".
"When that many-armed monster looked at me, I saw... something — an immense black shadow floating just beyond its gaze. There were no colours there at all... None."
languages.original_text: "Когда многорукое чудовище смотрело на меня, я видела... нечто. Огромную черную тень за пределами его взгляда. В ней не было цветов... вовсе".

traits.locale_text: "When that many-armed monster looked at me, I saw... something. An immense black shadow beyond its gaze. There were no colours... None."
"When that many-armed monster looked at me, I saw... something. An immense black shadow beyond its gaze. There were no colours... None."
"When that many-armed monster looked at me, I saw... something — an immense black shadow floating just beyond its gaze. There were no colours there at all... None."

"When that many-armed monster looked at me, I saw... something — an immense black shadow floating just beyond its gaze. There were no colours there at all... None."

languages.text: "Als dieses vielarmige Monster mich angesehen hat, habe ich ... etwas gesehen. Einen gewaltigen schwarzen Schatten, der unmittelbar hinter seinem Blick schwebte. Ich habe keinerlei Farben gesehen ... Keine einzige."
languages.original_text: "When that many-armed monster looked at me, I saw... something — an immense black shadow floating just beyond its gaze. There were no colours there at all... None."

traits.locale_text: "Als dieses vielarmige Monster mich angesehen hat, habe ich ... etwas gesehen. Einen gewaltigen schwarzen Schatten, der unmittelbar hinter seinem Blick schwebte. Ich habe keinerlei Farben gesehen ... Keine einzige."

languages.text: « Quand ce monstre tentaculaire a posé les yeux sur moi, j'ai vu... quelque chose, une immense ombre noire qui planait à la périphérie de son regard, entièrement dénuée de couleurs... »
languages.original_text: "When that many-armed monster looked at me, I saw... something — an immense black shadow floating just beyond its gaze. There were no colours there at all... None."

traits.locale_text: « Quand ce monstre tentaculaire a posé les yeux sur moi, j'ai vu... quelque chose, une immense ombre noire qui planait à la périphérie de son regard, entièrement dénuée de couleurs... »

languages.text: «Cuando ese monstruo de muchos brazos me miró, vi... algo. Una sombra inmensa, flotando más allá de su mirada. No había colores ahí. Ninguno en absoluto».
languages.original_text: "When that many-armed monster looked at me, I saw... something — an immense black shadow floating just beyond its gaze. There were no colours there at all... None."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando ese monstruo de muchos brazos me miró, vi... algo. Una sombra inmensa, flotando más allá de su mirada. No había colores ahí. Ninguno en absoluto».

languages.text: 「あの腕の多い怪物が私を見た瞬間、私が見たのは何か…視線の方向に浮く大きな黒い影でした。色は全く…ありませんでした」
languages.original_text: "When that many-armed monster looked at me, I saw... something — an immense black shadow floating just beyond its gaze. There were no colours there at all... None."

traits.locale_text: 「あの腕の多い怪物が私を見た瞬間、私が見たのは何か…視線の方向に浮く大きな黒い影でした。色は全く…ありませんでした」

languages.text: “当那个长着很多手臂的怪物看着我的时候，我看到了……某个东西。我看到了一个巨大的黑影漂浮在它的视线之外，那里没有任何色彩……什么都没有。”
languages.original_text: "When that many-armed monster looked at me, I saw... something — an immense black shadow floating just beyond its gaze. There were no colours there at all... None."

traits.locale_text: “当那个长着很多手臂的怪物看着我的时候，我看到了……某个东西。我看到了一个巨大的黑影漂浮在它的视线之外，那里没有任何色彩……什么都没有。”

languages.original_text: "When that many-armed monster looked at me, I saw... something — an immense black shadow floating just beyond its gaze. There were no colours there at all... None."

languages.text: "Şu çok kollu canavar bana baktığında gördüğüm... Hiçbir şeydi. Uçsuz bucaksız kapkara bir gölge, boşluğun da ötesinde süzülüyordu. Orada tek bir renk bile yoktu... Hiçbir renk yoktu."
languages.original_text: "When that many-armed monster looked at me, I saw... something — an immense black shadow floating just beyond its gaze. There were no colours there at all... None."
